short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Amazon products to your collection from multiple regions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EasyMark is a Chrome extension designed for Amazon sellers and marketers to streamline their product research process. With EasyMark, you can easily save products while browsing on Amazon and later export your saved product list as a CSV file. This tool is ideal for anyone conducting Amazon product research, helping you organize and export product data quickly and efficiently.

ðŸŒŸ Features
Save Products: Save Amazon products with a single click while browsing.
Product Details: Automatically captures product title, price, image, URL, country, and category.
Organize Products: Easily organize products by country and category for better management.
Search & Filter: Filter and search through saved products seamlessly.
Export to CSV: Export selected products as a CSV file for further analysis or sharing.
